Name: Forsterite Mg_2SiO_4
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicates
Subclass: Nesosilicates
Particle Size: 0-45um
Sample No.: NS-2A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: 
Collected by JPL
Description:  Synthetic forsterite. 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: ns02aa.txt
